message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the product is $900000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who is willing to make a significant investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $750000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My revised offer is $950000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to you and the minimum I'm willing to accept.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $950000. I'm willing to meet you at $850000, which I think is a fair price for both of us. I'm confident that the product will be worth it to me, and I'm willing to make a serious investment.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $900000, which is closer to my minimum price. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I believe the product's value to you is clear, and I'm confident that you'll see the benefits of investing in it. My revised offer is $900000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $900000, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price for me. I'm willing to go up to $875000, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand that you're trying to find a fair price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $920000. I believe this is the minimum price I can accept to make the deal worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you at $920000, but I'm not budging further. My revised offer is $920000.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower than $920000, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you at $915000, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm hoping we can finally meet on a price.

I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet on a price, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll meet you at $918000, which is very close to my minimum price. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. My revised offer is $918000.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $915000. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I'm not sure if it's worth it for me. I'd like to discuss this one last time before making a decision.
